item.title: MARA mined 705 BTC in August, with a total holding of 52,477 BTC.
item.description: September 7th, the Bitcoin mining firm MARA Holdings presented its unaudited Bitcoin mining update for August 2025. During August, the company successfully mined 705 BTC. As of August 31, 2025, MARA Holdings possesses a cumulative total of 52,477 BTC, and it did not dispose of any Bitcoin in August.

item.title: Analyst: Bitcoin is in a consolidation phase, slightly biased towards a bullish outlook
item.description: On September 7th, CryptoQuant analyst Axel Adler Jr. put out a post stating, "This week, the Bitcoin market entered a 'consolidation' stage. The price consolidated within the range of $110,000 to $112,000, near the crucial support level. Derivative sellers lost their dominance, yet the upward momentum remains feeble. On-chain indicators indicate a decrease in activity, while exchanges witnessed positive net outflows. In the macro environment, yields are on the decline, and the US labor market is soft, providing support for risk assets. The market is in a consolidation phase, slightly inclined towards a cautious uptrend, but it remains highly sensitive to inflation data and options expiry."

item.title: Venezuela's annual inflation rate reaches 229%, USDT and other stablecoins become a daily payment tool for the public
item.description: On September 7th, according to Cointelegraph, with Venezuela's annual inflation rate skyrocketing to 229%, stablecoins like USDT have turned into the de facto currency for millions of Venezuelans.Mauricio Di Bartolomeo, the co-founder of Ledn, stated that USDT, which was once limited to users familiar with cryptocurrency and commonly known as the "Binance USD" locally, is now widely used in daily transactions in Venezuela, including buying groceries, paying condo fees, and making salary and supplier payments.Venezuela's national currency, the Bolivar, has almost no practical value in daily commerce. Rampant inflation, strict capital controls, and a fragmented exchange rate system have led an increasing number of people to prefer using stablecoins rather than cash or local bank transfers.Di Bartolomeo commented: "People and companies prefer to price goods and services in dollars and receive dollars." He pointed out that USDT is now regarded as the "better dollar."

item.title: Ethereum Withdrawal Trend Continues, with CEX Net Outflow of 6544 ETH in the Last 24 Hours
item.description: On September 7th, according to Coinglass data, in the past 24 hours, CEX accumulated a net outflow of 6544 ETH. This includes:· Coinbase Pro had an outflow of 8,576.65 ETH and ranked first in the outflow list;· Kraken had an inflow of 2,007.13 ETH and ranked first in the inflow list.

item.title: A whale withdrew 10,366,000 DOGE from Binance, worth $2.25 million
item.description: On September 7th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale withdrew 10,366,000 DOGE from Binance after being dormant for 2 years. The amount withdrawn was worth $2.25 million.

item.title: Analyst: BTC Key Support Level at $108,250
item.description: On September 7th, the cryptocurrency analyst @ali_charts presented a chart analysis indicating that the crucial support level for BTC is $108,250. The lower support levels are $104,520 and $97,050 respectively.

item.title: Numerai Founder: Most websites displaying NMR TVL data are incorrect, actual value is around $20 million
item.description: On September 7th, Richard Craib, the founder of Numerai, tweeted, "Because of the unique characteristics of our staking mechanism, most websites display incorrect Total Value Locked (TVL) for NMR. For instance, CoinMarketCap shows $4 million, but it is actually approximately $20 million."

item.title: Cango mined 150.3 BTC this week, increasing its total holdings to 5277.1 BTC.
item.description: On September 7th, the Bitcoin mining firm Cango announced on the X platform that the company mined 150.3 bitcoins during this week. Up to now, Cango's total holdings of bitcoins have reached 5,277.1 bitcoins.

item.title: Bio Protocol Founder: to Launch Aubrai Terminal, Initiate IP-NFT Minting, and Smart Proxy System
item.description: On September 7th, Paul Kohlhaas, the founder of Bio Protocol, tweeted that "In the 8 days since the release of AUBRAI, $180,000 in fees were generated, and the transaction volume exceeded $20 million."The next step is to release the aubr.ai terminal, enabling IP-NFT minting from the terminal, launching Aubrai IPTs on Bio Protocol to fund experiments, and initiating RMR2 research.Cooperating with top scientists from around the world to launch intelligent agent systems for them, while hoping to enable all new DeSci builders and DAOs to succeed. Once Aubrai becomes fully autonomous, there will be multiple synchronous ignition sales in the future with permissionless openness.

item.title: Analyst: ETH Key Support Level is $4,260, Watch $4,000 if Broken
item.description: On September 7th, the cryptocurrency analyst @ali_charts released a chart analysis which said, "The key support level of ETH is $4260. If it is broken, we need to pay attention to $4000."
